reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cashmere sweater to be of good quality, with perfect style and color, and appreciate its softness, warmth, and comfort. The size receives mixed feedback, with some saying it fits great while others find it too small, and opinions on value are divided between those who consider it a great value and those who find it pricey.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value!
items.body: High quality, medium weight, warm & comfortable! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater!
items.body: I was a little Leary to buy Cashmere off Amazon. This is a great sweater. True to size. Blue color is pretty. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The sweaters are lovely, soft n warm.
items.body: Returning 11 cashmere sweaters due to phone glitch. They are fine quality sweater just too much of them! My daughter is returning them to ups Read more
items.author: Helen J.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cashmere sweater
items.body: Cashmere sweater is not American made run smaller so it did not fit will not purchase again Mary P Read more
items.author: Mary P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real top quality cashmir fabric.
items.body: Excellent quality, fair price/value proposition. Read more
items.author: Pedro Miguel Dolanyi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars OK but not high quality
items.body: I bought this to wear to an outdoor event in the fall. I wore a Cuddleduds warmer tank under it and a cover up over. It kept me warm. Out of package it had an odd odor and there was a spider in the bag it came in. The sweater itself fit well and was very soft. It looks as though the sweater will eventually form those little balls from wear. I own quite a few cashmere sweaters and this is probably a lower quality. Read more
items.author: Mittengirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful and soft - very comfy
items.body: This is my favorite sweater. The beige is such a beautiful neutral color and it's so comfortable to wear that it became my go-to sweater, Read more
items.author: GSTampa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars HORRIBLE QUALITY.
items.body: Horrible quality. So thin you could see trhu. Runs SMALL.... ill fitting . i sent it back. Read more
items.author: AMI

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Baby Blue, Cammello, Navy, Ivory, Black, Heather Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
